content.description: Which version of the underlined portion of sentence 9 (reproduced below) best conveys the writerâ€™s point about the stressful nature of space missions?
content.question: Space missions are stressful, requiring long hours of repetitive activity performed in small, sterile spaces.

skill.text: Skill 8.A: Strategically use words, comparisons, and syntax to convey a specific tone or style in an argument.
